job_history.work_description: Team player mentality, Fitness programming specialist, Verbal/written communication, Zumba instructor, Time Management, Nutrition supplement familiarity, Opened and closed the store, including counting cash, opening and closing cash registers and creating staff assignments as well as shared product knowledge with customers while making personal recommendations to meet that specific need.

Helped underemployed, unemployed, and undergraduates further their education through Continuing Education programs. Proctored C.R.C (Career Readiness Career) Testing. Helped with unemployment filing and weekly certification.
Taught Dance Fitness, Spin and Power. Designed each class to match the skill and learning levels of all participants. Cleaned and organized studio after each group fitness class.
Suggested exercise modifications to individual students to avoid strain and injury. Teach Circuit classes, Advanced Dance Fitness, and a Booty Builder class.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Demonstrated ability to manage time effectively in multiple roles, including opening and closing stores, teaching fitness classes, and handling administrative tasks.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Showcased verbal and written communication skills in various roles, including sharing product knowledge with customers and making personal recommendations.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Some experience with leadership, including creating staff assignments and leading group fitness classes, but limited scope and duration.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.explanation: Demonstrated ability to work effectively in teams, including as a sales associate and fitness instructor.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided customer service in various roles, including making personal recommendations and sharing product knowledge with customers.

skills.name: Fitness Instruction
skills.explanation: Extensive experience teaching various fitness classes, including Dance Fitness, Spin, Power, Circuit, and Booty Builder, demonstrating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Personal Training
skills.explanation: Provided personal training services, including suggesting exercise modifications to individual students, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Nutrition Supplement Familiarity
skills.explanation: Some familiarity with nutrition supplements, but limited scope and duration.

skills.name: Business Administration
skills.explanation: Basic familiarity with business administration, having completed an Associate of Arts degree in Business Administration Accounting, but limited practical experience.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Basic familiarity with accounting, having completed an Associate of Arts degree in Business Administration Accounting, but limited practical experience.
